001.name: CrewOne
001.text: Sir, we found this several miles from here.

002.name: Commander
002.text: This is familiar. But I don’t know what exactly.

003.name: Commander
003.text: Let’s send this to the Researcher. He might know what to do.

004.name: Commander
004.text: Player, I need you to assist the Researcher. He might need your skills.
